H6293.def: = process by which humans or animals unexpectedly meet other humans or animals while travelling from one location to another

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H4191.def: = process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

H8084.def: = state in which a countable entity is eight in number

H2568.def: = state in which a countable entity is five in number

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H906.def: = woven material ◄ made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; ► used for production of clothes; worn by priests and supernatural beings; ≈ associated with quality, strength, and coolness

H646.def: = garment; reaching from the shoulders to the waist; ◄ made from linen; ► normally worn by {L:priests<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}, but also by {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>} when the ark was brought to Jerusalem

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2719.def: = sharp object; ◄ made out of iron or flint; ► used as tool for various purposes

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H3243.def: = action by which newborn children drink milk from their mother's breasts

H2543.def: = domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see {L:עַיִר<SDBH:עַיִר>}; female see {L:אָתֹון<SDBH:אָתֹון>}

H7716.def: = an individual member of a group of {L:sheep<SDBH:כֶּבֶשׂ>} and {L:goats<SDBH:עֵז>} traveling and feeding together

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H288.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ahitub<SDBH:אֲחִיטוּב>}; ► father of {L:Abiathar<SDBH:אֶבְיָתָר>}; {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H4422.def: = action by which humans move away as fast as possible from a place that is considered insecure ► in order to save their lives

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H54.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ahimelech<SDBH:אֲחִימֶלֶךְ>}; ► {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H1272.def: = action by which humans move to another place in haste, ► in order to escape from a dangerous situation

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H54.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ahimelech<SDBH:אֲחִימֶלֶךְ>}; ► {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H5046.def: = causative action by which humans pass on information to others, usually by word of mouth

H7586.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kish<SDBH:קִישׁ>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2026.def: = causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H54.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ahimelech<SDBH:אֲחִימֶלֶךְ>}; ► {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H1673.def: = man; ◄ {L:Edomite<SDBH:אֲדֹמִי>}; ► official, during the time of king {L:Saul<SDBH:שָׁאוּל>}, who betrayed the whereabouts of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>} to his master and later killed the priests of YHWH

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H5046.def: = causative action by which humans pass on information to others, usually by word of mouth

H7586.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kish<SDBH:קִישׁ>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H595.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H5437.def: = process by which a door is attached to a wall by means of a {L:hinge<SDBH:צִיר>}, or a contraption with a similar function, which allows it to pivot

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3372.def: = state in which humans experience fear

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H1245.def: = action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H4931.def: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary
